about_the_game:
In the 'Downtown' series, you'll find different locations in the downtown area of a modern city. Visit a beautiful modern apartment on the marina in the Downtown: Marina Apartments episode DLC. Find some inner calm as you listen to birds chirping, some background traffic, and light murmurs from passersby while classical music plays on the jukebox.

*This episode currently features Ambiance Mode only and does not include a hidden objects game. It does include a short secret items game.*

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
detailed_description:
In the 'Downtown' series, you'll find different locations in the downtown area of a modern city. Visit a beautiful modern apartment on the marina in the Downtown: Marina Apartments episode DLC. Find some inner calm as you listen to birds chirping, some background traffic, and light murmurs from passersby while classical music plays on the jukebox.

*This episode currently features Ambiance Mode only and does not include a hidden objects game. It does include a short secret items game.*

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
name: Ambient Channels: Downtown - Marina Apartments

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: In the 'Downtown' series you'll find different locations in the downtown area of a modern city. In the 'Marina Apartments' episode you can visit a beautiful modern apartment on the marina and listen to soothing city sounds while classical music plays on the jukebox.
